projects.title: Ojol Life
projects.description: I'm a part of the team develop and mantaining this mobile simulation game by Maleo Game that simulates the life of an online motorcycle taxi driver, including rides, deliveries, and daily challenges.

projects.title: Bus Simulator Indonesia
projects.description: I'm a part of the team develop and mantaining simulation game by Maleo Game where players drive buses across realistic maps. This game has more than 100 millions download and still active.

projects.title: Pirate Mobile War (Unpublished)
projects.description: A complex 3D mobile strategy game with a strong storyline and planned real-time multiplayer features.

projects.title: Nonstop Show
projects.description: A mobile idle game with a street musician theme. Available worldwide on Google Play and localized in English and Indonesian. Nominated for Indie Prize Casual Connect Asia 2017 and Google Indonesia Game Contest 2017.

projects.title: Crazy Cargo
projects.description: A Unity-based game developed exclusively for Samsung Tizen. Winner of 1st Prize at Samsung INA 4.0 (2017).

projects.title: Ultimate Tower
projects.description: One of my most ambitious Flash projects featuring complex mechanics and award-winning gameplay.

projects.title: Condo Tail (Unpublished)
projects.description: Planned to combine SIMS-like and very popular Tamagochi game into a mobile game. The project is ambisious and unique experiment.

projects.title: Conjurer
projects.description: An RPG Flash game inspired by Diablo, featuring fast-paced combat and progression. Sponsored by Armor Games.

projects.title: Lynn Love
projects.description: A story-driven clicker game with a unique art style and smooth animation that gained attention from game reviewers.

projects.title: Squadron Auriga
projects.description: A flagship RTS project from Funever Studio featuring complex mechanics and a deep storyline designed for hardcore strategy players.

projects.title: Super Playboy
projects.description: A beat â€™em up fighting game with a strong storyline, comic-style visuals, and humorous effects that attracted significant attention among Flash gamers.

projects.title: Jumping Little Ninja
projects.description: A highly popular skill-based game featuring upgrade systems and a cartoon art style designed to appeal to casual gamers.

projects.title: Soul Job
projects.description: A skill-based sandbox game inspired by popular Flash-era genres, focusing on player precision and experimentation.

projects.title: The Last Village
projects.description: A strategy game with a beautiful art style that combines real-time and turn-based mechanics, creating a complex and challenging gameplay experience.
